name: Aesthetic Personal Homepage Notion Template
description: This template is ideal for anyone seeking a straightforward method to organize their pages on Notion with an aesthetic layout. With this template, you can easily link your existing pages, allowing you to access everything from a single location.You can download it for free by entering "0" in the price box, or feel free to tip any amount you wish.Light mode: Also available on Ko-fiDark mode: Also available on Ko-fi
